meanings.definition: A person who runs errands or performs tasks for someone else.
meanings.sent1: The legmen delivered the package to the customer.
meanings.sent2: The office has several legmen who help with filing and organizing.
meanings.sent3: The legmen raced to get the documents signed before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: The legmen were like busy bees, buzzing around the office with tasks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the legmen scurrying around the office stuck in my mind.
